attributes.action: Support the inclusion of an exemption for Airports from the Smoking Ban.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Flying is one of the more stressful activities any of us can undertake.  For those frightened of flying and who also smoke, they are already banned from smoking in their aircraft, to ban all smoking areas in airports would be excessive.

Also; these areas are sealed off from the non-smoking public so the aim of the Bill is still achieved; no non-smokers will be impacted by this exemption.

Last; there are already exemptions for smoking areas within otherwise smoke-free premises e.g. hotel bedrooms and homes for the elderley.
